description.para: This parameter controls whether Samba allows WSP queries on a share. For controlling indexing of filesystems you also have to use Tracker's own configuration system.

listitem.para: Samba must be configured and built with WSP support.
The wsp RPC service must be enabled, see below.
Tracker intergration must be setup and the share must be indexed by Tracker.
